readability_reflection: Concatenation is more readable in my opinion. The plus makes more sense compared to curly braces which I associate with loops, comparisons, functions, classes, etc
comprehension_debugging: Interpolation was challenging at times, especially in combination with quotation marks and parenthesis.
preference_rationale: I would use concatenation, like I always have.
learning_curve: I am quite familiar with concatenation, but very new to string interpolation.
